oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: "That's My Weakness Now"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Scrapbook page featuring at center a landscape drawing with trees, a creek, and the sun. A tiny photograph of an African-American couple has been pasted onto the landscape amidst the trees. The remainder of the page includes the text, "That's my weakness now," "I must be dreaming," "Girl of my dreams," and "Get out and - get under the moon."
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Couples; Streams; Trees; African Americans; Landscape photographs
